name: Bio-Rage
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Punch your way out of jail. Play as a furious prisonner, using your rage as fuel and your fists as weapons to get out of the prison.

Platform : Mobile / Tablet
Engine : Unity 3D
Number of players : 1

Game Designer : Adrien COTRAIT, Ulysse MERIGUET & Arthur PILPAY
Artiste : Fabien LE CURIEUX-DURIVAL & Emerick PALMIER
Game Level & Sound Designer : Johan PISON
